summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Harry Beller to have signing authority on his bank account at Deutsche Bank. It is a straightforward authorization letter without additional context or details regarding the accounts or their significance.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual granting signing authority on his bank account.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is granted signing authority on Jeffrey Epstein's bank account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the authorization letter at Deutsche Bank.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to manage his bank account, indicating a level of trust and responsibility.
Jeffrey Epstein is a client of Deutsche Bank, and Amanda Kirby is the representative handling his account.

keyFacts: The document is a letter dated September 30, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to have signing authority on his bank account.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
